name: Tumblr Semi-unflat (BORDERLESS)
description: Makes Tumblr less flat and a little easier on the eye.
additional_info:
This also resizes the back-to-top button back to 64px, and also unstickies the header.

Update 4: Notifications are blood orange red again. Update 3: Fixed shadows on titles of posts, Tumblr can't class right. Update 2: Blog popover moved up 40 pixels (I'm assuming this is a bug on Tumblr's end) Update 1: Fixed gradients on recommended blogs and radar.
